name: Crepes
steps: In bowl combine flour, sugar, baking powder and salt, dry whisk to combine.
Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often. Spray Pam on skillet, make sure it is well heated.
Pour about 1/4 c. batter in middle of pan, rotate pan until a think film covers the pan.
Cook over medium heat until very lightly browned, loosen edges and turn and cook on other side.
For topping: Blend cream cheese, sugar, zest and vanilla in a bowl. Whip cream separately and fold into cream cheese mixture. Serve in crepes with fresh fruit, ie. Strawberries, Kiwis, Bananas
